actions.committee: Senate Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.
Reported to Senate from the Committee on Post Office and Civil Service, S. Rept. 94-371.
Measure called up by unanimous consent in Senate.
Measure failed of passage in Senate, roll call #398 (39-53).

committees.committee: Senate Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A resolution disapproving the alternative plan for pay adjustments for Federal employees.

summary.text: Disapproves the alternative plan for pay adjustments for Federal employees as presented by the President on August 29, 1975.

titles.title: A resolution disapproving the alternative plan for pay adjustments for Federal employees.
